fields.jobsMax: Amount of "Success" Export Jobs to be stored
fields.markForNotLinkedAttribute: Mark for a not linked attribute
fields.limit: Maximum Number of Records per Iteration

labels.addMissingFieldsConfirmation: Are you sure you want to add all missing fields?
labels.removeAllItemsConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove all configurator rules?
labels.useAttributeNameAsColumnName: Use attribute name as a column name
labels.useInternalAttributeNameAsColumnName: Use internal attribute name as a column name
labels.useAttributeCodeAsColumnName: Use attribute code as a column name

messages.delimitersMustBeDifferent: All feed parameters should have unique values.
messages.columnAlreadyExist: A column with such name already exists.

exceptions.toManyAttributesSelected: Maximum amount of selected attributes should be below 2000 records.
exceptions.exportValidationFailed: You can not export such file. Please, check the form and try again.
exceptions.lastRecordIsRequired: Last record in the configurator cannot be removed.
exceptions.noFieldLabel: Label for the field '%s' for the language '%s' ist not set.
exceptions.noAttributeLabel: Label for the attribute '%s' for the language '%s' ist not set.

tooltips.language: This value is inherited by creating a rule for some language specific attribute and has no impact on export itself.
tooltips.channel: This value is inherited by creating a rule for some channel specific attribute and has no impact on export itself.
tooltips.convertCollectionToString: Fields and attributes of type: multi-enum, array, one-to-many relation.
tooltips.convertRelationsToString: Relation fields will be separated by Field Delimiter for Relation.
tooltips.replaceAttributeValues: Replace non-existing channel specific attribute values with global values.
